fields.name: Window Position
fields.description: Determines where the GBA window is positioned on the screen.

0.name: Centered
0.description: The GBA window is centered on the screen.

4.name: Left Centered
4.description: The GBA window is aligned to the left center.

8.name: Bottom Right
8.description: The GBA window is placed in the bottom-right corner.

12.name: Top Right
12.description: The GBA window is placed in the top-right corner.

16.name: Bottom Centered
16.description: The GBA window is aligned to the bottom center.

20.name: Slightly Left
20.description: The GBA window is slightly shifted to the left.

24.name: Slightly Right
24.description: The GBA window is slightly shifted to the right.
